text:
My thanks for accepting the invitation! I apologize for 
getting to business so quickly, but there was something I had 
hoped to discuss with you.
Do you find my attempts at modern lingo... obnoxious?

I see... if nothing else, your honesty is heartening. 
I am glad to have a Bestie who speaks their mind.

Hah! If I could, I would. It takes enough mental energy 
just to use what I can.

I... apologize. I will attempt to keep it to a minimum 
in the future, Bes- er, friend.

I suppose I do it in an attempt to modernize myself 
somewhat. Tis... difficult, to see the world you were 
raised within change, even for the better.

Perhaps you are correct. Still, I like to think 
there's more for me to do than just be accepting.

It appears I was right to speak to you about this. 
My sincerest gratitude for your assistance, Bestie.

I have quite a bit to think about. Perhaps we 
will meet again once I find my answer.

And what, keep myself trapped in antiquated beliefs 
with which I no longer abide!? That ain't it.

I had hoped you might be able to help me unravel this 
conflicted heart of mine. Yet it seems I have overestimated 
you. Good day.
